name: Boeing 767 to Frankfurt - British Airways Club Europe
description:
Fancy being a Patron? https://www.patreon.com/paulstripreports

Date of Travel: 03 FEB 2017
Aircraft: Boeing 767-300ER
Tail: G-BNWI
Livery: BA Standard
Route: LHR-FRA
Weather on Departure: Overcast, winds 15kts
Weather on Arrival: Overcast, winds calm
Airborne Time: 1h11m
Miles: 408
Remarks: This airframe is nearly as old as I am…


Thanks for finding my video and pressing play! 

Here, I take one of British Airways’ elderly Boeing 767s into Frankfurt am Main from London Heathrow. It’s not often I get a chance to fly an aircraft which is nearly as old as I am! 

This trip was in BA’s Club Europe cabin, which is a cost-effective short haul business class, and a fine way to get around Europe. 

I hope you enjoy the video!


MY MOST-WATCHED VIDEO - BRITISH AIRWAYS FIRST CLASS 787 REPORT: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4LRFyTtxlRg
